thread.title: quick example of 'no buttons' feature system

comments.text: using a combination of body tells we can now build multi level/feature systems. this is an example of a couple of hand gestures and a gun with variable ammo accessible without
in a contructive way i hope ;) floppy showed off some of your current hand featers when i ran into him  yesterday and they are magnificent. this demo i made is what ive been seeing
as a posibility when we got these extra tells, as you hav mentioned you would like avatar stuff to "just happen" so its bodily integratet and becomes "natural" or "reflexive".
building upon "controller controlled" avatar functionalities, possibly with a visible only to user interface you step through is closer to this than buttons and menus :)
yeah slops and i have been discussing this sort of idea for a while, he wants a 100% hidden-menus avatar at some point
since you are far deeper into avatar development than i am you might already know this but when add functionality like this to kraang i realized that combos of actions starts/ends
are really useful. for ive gone from using the context laser as an activator to using the opposite delete, leftdel plus rightdel activates gunmode and by use delete ends this can
be comboed using the same buttons without shooting context lasers all over the place. ldel+rdel gunmode, rdeloff switch ammo, ldel+rdel back to hand.
and perhaps closing/gripping a hand and then using the delete action is another good way of changing modes or stepping through a branching menu of options.
oh totally, that's how all my hand emotes work as well as many sub-functions of my buster etc.
